item.title: Weekly coming up!
item.description: Hi! After 3 months' graduate life, I am thinking I could make good use of weekly to record my work and study, at the same time, I do think this a efficient way to plan better. Bye!

item.title: Example content -- from Hugo example sites
item.description: Howdy! This is an example blog post that shows several types of HTML content supported in this theme.
